history.proof: induction l as [| h t IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. unfold iter'. rewrite IH. reflexivity.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
I: Type
T: Type
op: T -> T -> T
x0: T
neutral_l: forall x : T, op x0 x = x
neutral_r: forall x : T, op x x0 = x
assoc: forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z
l: seq I
f: I -> T

Goal:
iter l f = iter' l f

Premises:
Notation seq := list
iter = fix iter (l : seq I) (f : I -> T) {struct l} : T := match l with | [::] => x0 | h :: l' => op (f h) (iter l' f) end : seq I -> (I -> T) -> T Argument scopes are [seq_scope function_scope]
iter' = fun (l : seq I) (f : I -> T) => fold_right (fun (i : I) (acc : T) => op (f i) acc) x0 l : seq I -> (I -> T) -> T Argument scopes are [seq_scope function_scope]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Prop] ?B : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Prop]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Prop] ?B : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type] ?B : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
[::] : seq ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
Ring_polynom.PEI : Ring_polynom.PExpr ?C where ?C : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
Ring_polynom.PEO : Ring_polynom.PExpr ?C where ?C : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
size : seq ?T -> nat where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
drop : nat -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
Datatypes.cons : ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
take : nat -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
nth : ?T -> seq ?T -> nat -> ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
cat : seq ?T -> seq ?T -> seq ?T where ?T : [I : Type T : Type op : T -> T -> T x0 : T neutral_l : forall x : T, op x0 x = x neutral_r : forall x : T, op x x0 = x assoc : forall x y z : T, op x (op y z) = op (op x y) z l : seq I f : I -> T |- Type]
fold_symmetric : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> A -> A), (forall x y z : A, f x (f y z) = f (f x y) z) -> forall a0 : A, (forall y : A, f a0 y = f y a0) -> forall l : seq A, fold_left f l a0 = fold_right f a0 l
find_some : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : seq A) (x : A), List.find f l = Some x -> In x l /\ f x = true
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z...
Field_theory.rmul_ext : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> forall x y : R, req x y -> forall x0 y0 : R, req x0 y0 -> req (rmul x x0) (rmul y y0)
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
count_occ_cons_eq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A) (x y : A), x = y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = S (count_occ eq_dec l y)
Setoid.Seq_trans : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y z : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y z -> Aeq x z
NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> count_occ decA l x = 1%nat)
count_occ_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A) (x y : A), x <> y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = count_occ eq_dec l y
count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : seq A), count_occ decA l x = count_occ decB (List.map f l) (f x)
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x
count_occ_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A), (forall x : A, count_occ eq_dec l x = 0%nat) < -> l = [::]
count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A) (x : A), ~ In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x = 0%nat
ARsub_def : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rsub x y) (radd x (ropp y))
ARmul_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x)
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : seq A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
SetoidList.InA_dec : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) -> forall (x : A) (l : seq A), {SetoidList.InA eqA x l} + {~ SetoidList.InA eqA x l}
NoDup_count_occ : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : seq A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, (count_occ decA l x <= 1)%nat)

```coq
induction l as [| h t IH].
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. unfold iter'. simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: induction l as [| h t IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. unfold iter'. simpl. rewrite IH. reflexivity.
